Entries.1: Location/Meet The Explorer/You received a letter from the local astronaut. He claims to have information regarding the old community center./Enter the Explorer's tower./WizardHouse/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.3: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/You've found another note written by 'Mr. Qi'. The request is even more unusual this time./Place 10 beets inside King Bozo' fridge./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.4: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/You've found yet another strange note within the King's fridge. This time, the instructions are more cryptic./"Give the sand dragon his final meal."/null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.10: Basic/Copper Ore/You found a piece of copper ore. You're not sure what you can use it for, but the local blacksmith ought to know./Bring a piece of copper ore to Clunt's blacksmith shop././-1/0/-1/false
Entries.12: ItemHarvest/Smelting/Now that you've built a furnace, you can smelt some metal. According to Clunt's instructions, if you place 5 copper ore and 1 piece of coal in the furnace, it should produce a copper bar./Use your furnace to smelt a Copper Bar./334 1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.13: Basic/To The Beach/Someone named Lannery invited you to visit the beach south of town. He says he has something to give you./Visit the beach south of town before 5:00pm./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.21: Basic/Oscar's Request/Oscar came by the farm and asked if you'd bring him a cave carrot. She's trying to train his goats to speak, and cave carrot is their favorite snack./Bring a Cave Carrot into Oscar's shop./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.28: Basic/Dark Talisman/The Tiny Planet Explorer asked me to retrieve the magic ink from his ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman./Enter the sewer and ask Krobus about the dark talisman./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.100: LostItem/Robin's Lost Axe/Robin lost her favorite axe. The last time she remembers using it, she was cutting wood south of Oscar's hotel./Find Robin's lost axe./Robin 788 Forest 110 81/-1/250/-1/true/Hey, you found my axe! What a relief... I almost chopped my toe off with the other one I was using. Thank you!
Entries.102: LostItem/King's "Shorts"/King bozo has lost his purple "shorts". He's asking you to find and return them... Discreetly./Find and return King Bozo' purple shorts./Lewis 789 AnimalShop 13 7/-1/750/-1/true/You found them... where? ...Oh!...Uhmm...Heh.#$b#There? I have no idea how they could've gotten there...*cough*#$b#This stays between you and me. Got it?$u
Entries.104: ItemDelivery/Crop Research/Bababooey needs a fresh melon for his research./Bring Bababooey a melon./Demetrius 254/-1/550/-1/true/This is perfect! It's just what I need for my research. It's going to be hard not to eat it! Thanks a bunch.
Entries.106: ItemDelivery/Cow's Delight/Oscar wants to give his cows a special treat. She's asking for a single bunch of amaranth./Bring Oscar one bunch of amaranth./Marnie 300/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the amaranth I asked for! Thank you so much... my cows are going to love this!$h
Entries.107: LostItem/Blackberry Basket/It's blackberry season, but Nintendad can't find his basket! He's asking you to help him find it. He has no idea where it is./Find Nintendad' basket and return it to him./Linus 790 Backwoods 27 27/-1/0/-1/true/My basket! Thank you. This means a lot to me.$h
Entries.108: ItemDelivery/Carving Pumpkins/Jil wants to carve a pumpkin with her daughter. She asked you to bring her one from the farm./Bring Jil a pumpkin./Caroline 276/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the pumpkin! It's a good one... Abigail will be so happy when she sees this. Thanks, @!$h
Entries.109: ItemDelivery/Catch A Squid/Lannery is challenging you to catch a squid. He says you can fish them from the ocean on winter nights./Bring Lannery a squid./Willy 151/-1/800/-1/true/Hey, you did it! Not bad. Not bad at all. I'm impressed.#$b#Winter's a good time to break out the old fishing rod, isn't it?
Entries.110: ItemDelivery/Clunt's Attempt/Clunt wants you to give Emily an amethyst. He wants you to tell her it's from him./Bring Emily an Amethyst./Emily 66/-1/0/-1/true/Oh, my favorite stone! You're so sweet!$h#$b#Huh? It's from who?$u#$b#Oh, you got it at Clunt's? Well I don't care where you got it from, it's beautiful! Thank you! *smooch*$h
Entries.111: ItemDelivery/A Dark Reagent/The Explorer wants you to descend into the mines and fetch him a Void Essence. He needs it for some kind of dark magic./Bring Explorer a Void Essence./Wizard 769/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah, you've brought it. You've earned my gratitude, and a 1000g reward. Now go.
Entries.112: ItemDelivery/A Favor For Clunt/Clunt got a new hammer and he wants to test it out on a variety of metals./Bring Clunt an Iron Bar./Clint 335/-1/500/-1/true/Hey, it's the iron bar I asked for. It looks strong... perfect.#$b#Thanks, @. I appreciate this.
Entries.114: ItemDelivery/Fish Stew/Bobby wants to make fish stew, but he needs an albacore./Bring Bobby an Albacore./Gus 705/-1/400/-1/true/*sniff*...*sniff*... What's that? Something smells like albacore!#$b#Aha! You brought it! Thanks a million!
Entries.116: ItemDelivery/Granny's Gift/Evelyn wants to surprise her husband with a gift./Bring Evelyn a Leek./Evelyn 20/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, thank you, dear. This leek looks delicious. George will be so happy.#$b#He loves when I make eggs with leeks for breakfast.
Entries.117: ItemDelivery/Gil's Notice/Gil will pay "top coin" to whoever brings him a plate of sashimi. Apparently he's really craving the stuff./Bring Gil some Sashimi./Pierre 227/-1/1000/-1/true/It's about time! I was starting to get the shakes, I wanted this fish so bad. *munch*... Mmm, now that's good.#$b#Thanks, @.$h
Entries.118: ItemDelivery/Aquatic Research/Bababooey is studying the toxin levels of the local pufferfish. He'd like you to bring him one./Bring Bababooey a Pufferfish./Demetrius 128/-1/1000/-1/true/There you are. The specimen looks perfect. I'm going to get it on ice straight away. Thanks, @!
Entries.120: ItemDelivery/King's Need/King Bozo wants truffle oil. He won't explain what it's for. Maybe it's none of your business./Bring King Bozo a bottle of Truffle Oil./Lewis 432/-1/750/-1/true/You got the oil? Let me see...#$b#It's high quality... very slick. Great. Thank you.
Entries.121: ItemDelivery/Wanted: Lobster/Bobby put out a notice requesting a fresh lobster./Bring Bobby a Lobster./Gus 715/-1/500/-1/true/Something smells like fresh lobster. Oh, that's good.$h#$b#Take care, friend.
Entries.123: ItemDelivery/Staff Of Power/The Explorer is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. He needs an iridium bar to finish it./Bring Explorer an Iridium Bar./Wizard 337/-1/5000/-1/true/Ah, precious iridium. You've done well, @. You have my gratitude. Now, leave.
Entries.124: ItemDelivery/Catch a Lingcod/Lannery is challenging you to catch a Lingcod./Bring Lannery a Lingcod./Willy 707/-1/550/-1/true/Hey, that's a real lunker! You've certainly got the angler's blood in you.$h
Entries.125: ItemDelivery/Exotic Spirits/Bobby wants to make a Coco-no-no, but he's missing the main ingredient./Bring Bobby a Coconut./Gus 88/-1/600/-1/true/Coconut! Now there's a soothing sight for my winter eyes.$h#$b#It's going to be perfect for my coco-no-no. Thanks!
